Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 58 (47) with 7 fours and 3 sixes
Wanindu Hasaranga (3/58), Charith Asalanka (3/30) and Dunith Wellalage (2/39) were the pick of the bowlers for Sri Lanka
KL Rahul and Axar Patel stitched a crucial 57-run stand for sixth wicket off 94 balls
Shivam Dube (25 off 24) fought hard till the end and left his team on the brink of a win with just one run required off 14 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and Sri Lanka tied the first ODI of the three-match series at R.Premadasa Stadium, Colombo
Dunith Wellalage held Sri Lankan innings together with 67* (65)
Others: Rohit Sharma's funny stump mic chatter for LBW call went viral in 1st ODI
